item.title: Singapore: Home Prices Won't Spark a Malaysian Exodus
item.description: Singapore: Home Prices Won’t Spark a Malaysian Exodus The recent surge in home prices in Singapore has led to concerns that it could spark an exodus of Malaysians to Singapore. However, experts argue that this is unlikely to happen. There are a number of reasons why Malaysians are still likely to choose to live in Malaysia, even with the higher home prices in Singapore.
